Zack and Cody are the twins from the suite life who have been put on weight recently & already they weighed a massive 300lbs. Including they have a free room for themselves since they gain a lot of weight. One day Zack was sleeping on his king size bed due to the fact that he & Cody broke their single beds when he hears his cellphone which was a text from his fat twin brother Cody which says:

Zack! Meet me at the warehouse building quick. Because I got some surprise for you!

Your fat twin Cody
P.S. Once you out there, would you mind get a triple cheeseburger for me? Thanks!

After Zack read a text from his cellphone, he then quickly get changed as he struggle to fit on & heading off to see Cody. After a few minute walk with one stop which a fast food takeaway, Zack finally arrived at the warehouse building when he see's Cody who is (like it says) also fat as well, the same weight as Zack as he approach to him.

Cody: Me too!

Zack: Yeah?
Cody Well how about if the two of us you & me can become fat giants by using a growth ray gun?
Zack: Yeah that's totally awesome! How did you know I was going to say that!
Cody: You told me after the film.
Zack: Oh yeah I remember! And you as well?
Cody: Yeah I love to since you teach me how to be fat like you.
Zack: Fair enough! Let's do this thing!
Cody: Yeah but before that, I want you to put on your speedos it's because you don't want your clothes getting ripped apart.

Just few minutes later when the fat twins one at the time got changed into their speedos which they feeling good with their weight.

Cody: Okay! we're ready to go then!

And they did as the twins standing side by side when Cody shoots the ray gun towards them and then they started to grow.

Cody: Oh! Okay!

So the twin begin to stand up as the building became knocking down into bits.

Professor Peter Cowe has been involved as a scientist for 2 months now just at the age of 18. Once it was done, his brother asked Peter to be a scientist & replied yes & that's why he's in his posistion right now as he just finished building a brand new machine when somebody arrived to meet him & it was Zack & Cody. But this time, they both looked very different now because they are fat by weighing at a massive 500lbs wearing each with 2 white trainers, 2 black sweatpants & 2 t-shirts in different colour.

The reason why they put on weight it's not because of the feeding. It's because of Peter as a month ago, he build a weight gain machine which made both twins fatter & it worked very well. But now they back as they waddled towards Peter when they asked something which involves bigger heights.

Peter: Ok! Just closer to each other & stand still.
The twins: Ok!

Peter then gets into his posistion when he starts the machine looked like a large ray gun but with the legs supporting the weight of the machine. He aims at two fat twins as he starts shoots towards them with a bright green beam & then the matter of seconds later, Both of them are started to grow bigger. Peter couldn't believe his eyes sawing both Zack & Cody grew taller, just as they went through the ceiling & starts to spread out here until they finally stopped growing in few seconds later. Well they weighed at 500bs & the height they grew is 200ft tall & both twins looked down at the small building they can see in point of view with the expressing with the big smiles on their fat face.

Zack: Wow Cody! We're both freakin huge!
Cody: Yeah! And I can't wait to get our hands on this tiny city don't you?
Zack: Yeah! Certainly! Hey Peter! How do you like the size of us now?
Peter: Well you looked great in my point of view.
Cody: Aww! Thanks for making us into fat giants Peter! And we felt sorry for your wrecked building we grew through.
Peter: It's alright boys! This building is repairable with the control button in my pocket.
Zack: No problem! Thanks for the tip!
Cody: See ya!
Peter: No problem boys! See you later!

The twins then began to waddle again by this time with a huge footsteps they made the lab shaking like an earthquake. They approaching their first stop as fat giants & that is...

info.brief_description: After the twins gain weight, they decided it's time to become fat giants.
info.description:
Before the twins from the suite life becomes fat giants, just the things above that you need to know.

*No sex & No toilet stuff (Stay it clean)

*Only the twins can grow into fat giants but not others.

*The twins must stay mobile as they're keep on balance

*Theey could get their clothes ripped off but not the underwear/speedos I don't want them nude

*This is not a shrinking or a weight loss story so please stay in topic

*Please use good grammar & spelling 100%!

*They cannot die in this story

*I don't want the end of this story. Keep Adding!

And one last thing, Have fun & enjoy this story.

UPDATE 27/1/13: This is a warning for those who adds the chapters of this story from this update as from now on I don't want any short chapters of this story at all. If you add any chapters with one sentence, one paragraph or less then three lines of this story will be automatically deleted indefinitely so please read the rules before adding.

UPDATE 5/10/19: I'm also interested in roleplay, if you want to have a go? If so, either let me know either here or on Discord pjc-fc#4186 and Iâll see what we can come up for this.
